text: [[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"Unfortunately, the flagon with the dragon got smashed…"\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nOnly men of status own their own bibles; fewer still such a fine copy.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Scribe buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Ingelrd Sword[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 5[[/rgba]]\\nThe finest Frankish blade, inscribed with geometric patterns and the name of its maker, to infuse it with his skill.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"This will send you on your way."\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Decorated Bible[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"Such a beautiful piece - it is almost a shame to wield it in anger, but in anger it must be borne."\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Scales & Weights[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nPast glories are preserved for the future with intricate detail, picked out in threads of gold and silver amongst the traditional cotton or linen.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Scribe buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Inscribed Knife[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nIt's cold in the north - such a brooch ensures one's cloak stays in position, regardless of the weather.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Gold Jewellery[[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Ulfberht Sword[[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Drinking Horn[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nA ring of gold remains a mark of wealth and status, but is a more modest display, suitable for the pious, God-fearing among the nobility.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nKnowing the weight of gold is a start…\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Gilt Helmet[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"Apparently, Thor himself drank the seas themselves from such a vessel!"\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Gold Ring[[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Prayer Book[[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Elaborate Brooch[[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Tapestry[[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Genealogies[[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Jewelled Chalice[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThis fine helm belies the status of the wearer.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"Have you seen all that gold? I'm not sure if we're seeing the heir to the kingdom or Jesus Christ himself"\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThis way, the correct intercession for the moment is always at hand.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Scribe buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nFamily histories are an essential tool via which matters of succession and legitimacy are decided.\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Scribe buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Garnet Hilt Sword[[/rgba]]

[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThis hefty Viking sword is every bit as effective as any of its north European counterparts, although none of its victims were available for comment…\\n[[/rgba]] \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from Smith buildings and followers.][[/rgba]]
